abstract: In Farsi, the word for transition translates as foot in the air.
description: In Farsi, the word for transition translates as foot in the air. With one foot in the air, Laura Brearley's life changes dramatically. The injuries she sustained have lasted throughout her life, but they are indicative of both her vulnerability and resilience. On reflection, she realises her transition was not all bad, after all.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002004; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (September 2007); Active; 2007
